#summary Lightweight library for loading ( and saving ) image files into OpenGL with various loading options

== Features ==
 * TGA, PNG, JPEG, DDS file loading
 * TGA, PNG, JPEG file storing
 * [ImageQuality RoundDown and PicMip] at load time 
 * Min/Mag filter changes in runtime
 * Reload All Images (when changes where done or the gl context was lost)

== List of authors ==
 * Santo Pfingsten (TTK-Bandit)

== Dependencies ==
 * [http://www.ijg.org/ libJPEG]
 * [http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/libpng.html libPNG]
 * [LibraryCommon Common]
 * [LibraryShared Shared]
